ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute Fun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You mean people out there don t like me?    That s a shocker. heh.  I have a no nonsense attitude, and a lot of these 12 yr olds haven t had proper
ygData.messageBody:
> Get some cha+ gear and people will like you more <kidding>

You mean people out there don't like me? <gasp> That's a shocker.
heh. I have a no nonsense attitude, and a lot of these 12 yr olds
haven't had proper discipline yet. (even some 45/46 yr olds too) <g>

Thus, I become like their parent bossing them around, and they wont
hear it...

/ooc Please don't stand near that corner house, or you will train
stuff out of it while we setup. We'll start pulling in a sec.
Also please don't wander around, or hail stuff, stay put in
the corner.

Then I hear:

'hail a revultant rat'

[Ranger thinking it looks clear, shoots at it, pulls it home,
thank god it was single, still we werent ready]

Fight the rat, all the way up against the house wall (idiots)
boom, boom, boom.... 3 scorn banshees and an abhorant join the
fun.

Everyone dies. heh. That whip on the rat isn't that good either
to be chasing down rats like that ;p

Some people just don't listen. It's those people who don't learn
after a mistake that really scare me tho.

Harm, born to lead.
